scripts.setup:dev: npm ci && npm ci --prefix json && npm ci --prefix y-json && npm ci --prefix y-react && npm ci --prefix y-redux
scripts.setup:prod: npm ci && npm ci --prefix json --only=prod && npm ci --prefix y-json --only=prod && npm ci --prefix y-react --only=prod && npm ci --prefix y-redux --only=prod
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:dist
scripts.check: npm run check:format && npm run check:lint && npm run check:ts
scripts.build:netlify: npm run clean && cd json && npm i && echo 'Built json!' && cd .. && cd y-json && npm run build:example && echo 'Built y-json!' && cd .. && cd y-redux && npm run build:example && echo 'Built y-redux!' && cd .. && cd examples/react-example && npm i; npm run build; cd ../../ && echo 'Built react-example!'
